title: Schneider Electric EcoStruxure Data Center Expert Improper Verification of Cryptographic Signature Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
The vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Schneider Electric EcoStruxure Data Center Expert. Authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the handling of upgrade bundles. The issue results from the lack of proper verification of a cryptographic signature. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of root.
addtionnal_details: Schneider Electric has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://www.cisa.gov/news-events/ics-advisories/icsa-24-289-02
timeline:
2024-07-16 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2024-10-17 - Coordinated public release of advisory
